page.title: 16RECREATION-A DAYS SHOOTING-A
page.content:
A DAY OUT SHOOTING WITH MARK GRAVES,AGED TWELVE.
LAST SATURDAY I WENT BEATING WITH MY DAD,WHO IS A VERY KEEN HUNTER.MY DAD GOT MY BREAKFAST,THEN I WENT TO THE GARDEN SHED WHERE I GOT OUT THE BEATING STICKS.I THEN FED MY DOG AND GOT MY LEGGINGS FROM THE GARAGE.WHEN IT WAS NINE OCLOCK WE LEFT,WITH MY UNCLE WHO WAS COMING WITH US.WE THEN WENT TO RIVERSHALL WHERE THE FARMER LIVES,AND WAITED FOR THE REST OF THE SHOOTING PARTY TO JOIN US.THEY SOON ARRIVED,AND BROUGHT THEIR DOGS,BARLEY AND FIG.WE TRAVELLED TO THE FIELDS BY TRAILER.THE GUNS WENT TO MR MINTER'S LAKE TO SHOOT SOME DUCKS,WHILE WE WERE GETTING SET UP.WE WERE NEARLY HALF WAY ACROSS THE FIRST FIELD,WHEN I ALMOST STOOD ON A HARE.AS WE GOT TO THE FAR EDGE OF THE FIELD I HEARD ABOUT TWENTY
